changeSet.createView: SELECT RJS.REPORT_JOB_ID, FORMATDATETIME(MAX(CASE RJS.REPORT_JOB_STATUS_ID WHEN 0 THEN RJS.CREATED END), 'yyyy-MM-dd') as DAY_ID, MAX(U.NAME) AS USER_NAME, MAX(U.LAST_NAME || ' ' || U.FIRST_NAME || ' ' || U.PATRONYMIC) AS FIO, RJS.REPORT_ID, MAX(R.NAME) AS REPORT_NAME, MAX(CASE RJS.REPORT_JOB_STATUS_ID WHEN 0 THEN RJS.CREATED END) AS QUEUING_TIME, MAX(CASE RJS.REPORT_JOB_STATUS_ID WHEN 1 THEN RJS.CREATED END) AS START_TIME, MAX(CASE RJS.REPORT_JOB_STATUS_ID WHEN 2 THEN RJS.CREATED END) AS DATA_TIME, MAX(CASE WHEN RJS.REPORT_JOB_STATUS_ID IN (2, 3, 5) THEN RJS.CREATED END) AS FINISH_TIME, MAX(RJS.ROW_COUNT) AS ROW_COUNT, MAX(LST.NAME) AS FINAL_STATUS, FORMATDATETIME(MAX(CASE RJS.REPORT_JOB_STATUS_ID WHEN 0 THEN RJS.CREATED END), 'yyyy') as YEAR_ID, FORMATDATETIME(MAX(CASE RJS.REPORT_JOB_STATUS_ID WHEN 0 THEN RJS.CREATED END), 'MM') as MONTH_ID, FORMATDATETIME(MAX(CASE RJS.REPORT_JOB_STATUS_ID WHEN 0 THEN RJS.CREATED END), 'yyyy-MM') as YEAR_MONTH, FORMATDATETIME(MAX(CASE RJS.REPORT_JOB_STATUS_ID WHEN 0 THEN RJS.CREATED END), 'ww') as WEEK_ID, FORMATDATETIME(MAX(CASE RJS.REPORT_JOB_STATUS_ID WHEN 0 THEN RJS.CREATED END), 'yyyy-ww') as YEAR_WEEK FROM REPOSITORY.REPORT_JOB_STAT_VIEW RJS INNER JOIN REPOSITORY.REPORT R ON R.REPORT_ID = RJS.REPORT_ID INNER JOIN REPOSITORY.USERS U ON U.USER_ID = RJS.USER_ID INNER JOIN REPOSITORY.REPORT_JOB_STATUS LST ON LST.REPORT_JOB_STATUS_ID = RJS.LAST_STATUS_ID GROUP BY RJS.REPORT_JOB_ID, RJS.REPORT_ID;
